title: Trump backs release of Epstein files ahead of House vote: Live updates
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reversed course and backed a House bill that's expected to get a vote Tuesday forcing DOJ to release its Jeffrey Epstein files.

title: Trump open to talking to Maduro
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he is open to speaking to Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro amid rising tension with the country.

title: Supreme Court to review Trump border policy that limits asylum seekers
shortDescription: The Justice Department said border officials must be able to turn away asylum seekers during surges. Lower courts said that's against the law.

title: Trump wants Epstein files released
shortDescription: In a stunning reversal, President Trump posted on Truth Social that Republicans should release the Epstein files.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump drops a MAGA ally
shortDescription: The president withdraws endorsement of Marjorie Taylor Greene. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: Indiana lawmaker victim of swatting after Trump criticism on social media
shortDescription: A fake report brought authorities to the home of Indiana state Sen. Greg Goode hours after President Donald Trump called him out over redistricting.

title: In stark reversal, Trump says House GOP should vote to release Epstein files
shortDescription: In a stunning reversal, President Donald Trump called on House Republicans to vote for the full release of files related to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Americans think the GOP won shutdown negotiations, new poll says. Here's why
shortDescription: The results come in stark contrast to polls taken amid the shutdown that showed Republicans shouldering the brunt of voter criticism.

title: Why are Donald Trump and Marjorie Taylor Greene fighting? Here's the story.
shortDescription: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene has long been one of Donald Trump's staunchest MAGA allies. Until now.

title: Trump threatens to sue BBC for $5 billion
shortDescription: President Trump said he would likely sue the BBC for up to $5 billion after the broadcaster acknowledged it wrongly edited a video of a speech.

title: GOP lawmaker hits back after Trump appears to knock his marriage
shortDescription: Rep. Thomas Massie hit back at President Donald Trump this week, accusing the president of "trying to be a bully."

title: Trump cuts ties with Marjorie Taylor Greene
shortDescription: President Trump said he would no longer endorse Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene and encouraged people to challenge her in the Georgia Republican primary.

title: 'Hope to make up'. Marjorie Taylor Greene weighs in on her beef with Trump
shortDescription: "I certainly hope that we can make up," Greene told CNN when asked if the president and the Georgia Republican have a path forward.

title: Trump pardons Jan. 6 rioter for gun charges
shortDescription: While the president already pardoned Jan. 6 defendants, the Kentucky man also had convictions federal gun charges.

title: Cheney’s shift: From fighting Dems over Iraq to joining them against Trump
shortDescription: Dick Cheney was on the other side of the fence from Democrats when advocating for the Iraq war but he partnered with them opposing Trump after Jan. 6.

title: New law puts familiar drinks, creams and gummies in legal limbo
shortDescription: The new hemp rules close a loophole that allowed hemp-derived products containing THC to be sold.

title: Trump says he knows nothing about Epstein emails
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters on Air Force One that he knows "nothing" about new public Jeffrey Epstein emails, which mention him.

title: Trump hints at decision on whether to attack Venezuela
shortDescription: "I can’t tell you what it would be, but I’ve sort of made up my mind," Trump told reporters on Air Force One on Nov. 14.
